data.title: Right A Pyramid Pop Flash For A Cave Choke Point
data.description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE from behind the right A Pyramid to pop flash players as they push out of A Cave into A Site.

data.title: A Hall Pop Flash From A Metal Doors
data.description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE from the A Metal Doors to pop flash players peeking into A Hall.

data.title: B Elbow ZERO/POINT From A Pyramids
data.description: This ZERO/POINT for B Elbow from behind the right A Pyramid is easy to set up, and almost impossible to destroy.

data.title: Middle Of A Pyramids FRAG/MENT To Delay Spike Plant
data.description: This is a great FRAG/MENT to delay the Attackers from planting the Spike in the center of the A Pyramids, or at least do damage to them if they attempt to plant the Spike there while potentially forcing them to plant the Spike elsewhere.
